# NSButton.BezelStyle.push

**Case**

A standard push style button.

## Declaration

```swift
case push
```

## Discussion

Use this style when you want the default button style.





For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/buttons].

## Push

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.flexiblePush**: A push button with a flexible height to accommodate longer text labels or an image.

items.description: A push button with a flexible height to accommodate longer text labels or an image.
